div.a: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 449 Vedea, 18 km. W of Giurgiu, Rumania, 1965 Burial: c. 280 B.C. (Mitrea) Contents: 18 AR. Pot hoard Alexander III: 14 tetradr. Philip III: 2 tetradr. Lysimachus: 1 tetradr. Seleucus I: 1 tetradr. Disposition: Giurgiu Mitrea, Dacia 1967, p. 382 Radulescu-Ionescu, SCN 4 (1968), pp. 442-4
